title: Debt adjusting prohibited; penalty; contracts void
context: §446-2 Debt adjusting prohibited; penalty; contracts void. Any person who acts or offers to act as a debt adjuster in this State shall be fined not more than $500 or imprisoned not more than six months, or both. Any contract for debt adjusting entered into with a person engaged in the business for a profit shall be void and unenforceable and the debtor may recover from the debt adjuster all sums or things deposited with the debt adjuster and not disbursed to the debtor&rsquo;s creditors. [L 1967, c 3, §3; HRS §446-2; gen ch 1985] Cross References Classification of offense and authorized punishment, see §§701-107, 706-640, and 706-663.
